title: Gifted friends
body: I gifted a few of my friends on the legacy client and it took the RP but didn't send them the skins

replies.body: Thanks for clarifying that it was the legacy client!  I looked into this, and I was able to confirm gifts being sent.  It may have just been a delay, but let me know if you see any issues!
Thank you, my friends received the skins about half an hour later. While it was indeed delayed, it's better than none being sent.
